channel.title: CVE Feed for FV Flowplayer Video Player -- FV Flowplayer Video Player
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FV Flowplayer Video Player -- FV Flowplayer Video Player

item.title: CVE-2021-39350|2024-08-04T02:06:42.477Z -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: The FV Flowplayer Video Player WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the player_id parameter found in the ~/view/stats.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions 7.5.0.727 - 7.5.2.727.
